BREAKING: Home prices in 20 U.S. cities rose at the slowest pace in nearly 7 years in March, climbing 2.7% from last year, S&P Dow Jones just reported. 

LA & San Diego were the worst performers with 1.3% growth each, while Las Vegas & Phoenix topped the list at 8.2% & 6.1%.

Dr. Eberstadt says it would have to be tested and rolled out very carefully, to ensure it did not “adversely affect participation in the ACS or in other surveys where it might be asked.” He talks about linking data across databases and population surveys. #2020Census #JECHearing

.@RepBeatty asks the full panel: “Do you have concerns that the inclusion of a question about a person’s criminal history” might impact the accuracy of the census data or the number of people who would be asked. #2020Census #JECHearing
Dr. Reamer: “My understanding is there is no adjustment. Whatever the count is, that’s the count.” Cites a SCOTUS decision from the mid-90s. #2020Census #JECHearing

.@RepKenMarchant (R-TX) admits concern in Texas: “We want every nose counted.” Asks, “Will there be an adjustment for the undercount for the undercount? Or will there just be a general adjustment of the definition of the undercount?” #2020Census #JECHearing
“Where the government is not trusted, you need to have people out in the community setting up relationships with…local trusted entities,” says Mr. Fienberg. #JECHearing #2020Census

He says while average businesses don’t have a political position, they’re risk averse, and don’t want to get involved in the political controversy or being seen as taking a side on a political issue. #2020Census #JECHearing

Dr. Rivlin brought intelligence, discipline and professionalism to each role she undertook. 

Her influence on our country’s economic policies over the last 45 years cannot be overstated, and she will be greatly missed.

We’re deeply saddened to hear about the passing of Dr. Alice Rivlin earlier today. 

From the CBO to the OMB to the Federal Reserve, Dr. Rivlin used her knowledge and skill to help our country navigate decades of economic challenges.
